alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 3:57PM CDT until April 15 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL GREENE COUNTY... At 356 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Republic, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 354 PM, Emergency Management reported ping pong size hail 2 miles west of Springfield. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Battlefield, Willard, Brookline, Glidewell, Ebenezer and Turners. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 70 and 84. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
